Text: Thanx for this, I hope for more races
Thanks for this darmeth, I missed the race cause of the bloody wife !!!!
This was one of my all time favorite races. Amazing... You're in for a couple of jaw-dropping passes, and a good laugh... I know I laughed my ass off.
Man, the commentators aren't as good as the guys on Speed channel. Their sense of humor made it twice as good.
I really hope for the race in Spa this weekend. My hope stands to you darmeth :)
